categories: Category:Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Engdo Taliav was a male Sith Pureblood Sith Warrior of the reconstituted Sith Empire who was present in the settlement of Raider's Cove on Rishi during the Galactic War.
Engdo Taliav appears as a Sith warrior trainer in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014.
